title: String Utility Functions
description:
Create utility functions for common string operations.

## Requirements

1. Define `is_palindrome(text)` that returns True if text reads the same forwards and backwards (ignoring case)
2. Define `count_vowels(text)` that returns the count of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in the text
3. Define `reverse_words(text)` that returns the text with word order reversed

## Example Usage

```python
is_palindrome("Radar")      # Returns True
is_palindrome("Hello")      # Returns False
count_vowels("Hello World") # Returns 3
reverse_words("Hello World") # Returns "World Hello"
```
